comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Luitpold, Prince Regent of Bavaria (German: Prinzregent Luitpold Karl Joseph Wilhelm Ludwig von Bayern) (12 March 1821 – 12 December 1912), was the de facto ruler of Bavaria from 1886 to 1912, due to the incapacity of his nephews, King Ludwig II and King Otto. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luitpold,_Prince_Regent_of_Bavaria
